languages.text: {n}Как только голос жреца затихает, ваше тело с хрустом изгибается, как от удара током. Вы стоите на цыпочках и широко раскрытыми глазами глядите на алое закатное небо, ставшее океаном из пролитой крови. Тихую гладь разрывает покрытая перстнями рука, и Каллигос Винтерскейл выныривает из глубин — но лишь для того, чтобы сделать очередной вдох и вновь погрузиться на дно. Это происходит снова, и снова, и снова... Пока Винтерскейл, наконец, не замечает вас. Он вскидывает руку и тянется к вам... Тянется... {/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Как только голос жреца затихает, ваше тело с хрустом изгибается, как от удара током. Вы стоите на цыпочках и широко раскрытыми глазами глядите на алое закатное небо, ставшее океаном из пролитой крови. Тихую гладь разрывает покрытая перстнями рука, и Каллигос Винтерскейл выныривает из глубин — но лишь для того, чтобы сделать очередной вдох и вновь погрузиться на дно. Это происходит снова, и снова, и снова... Пока Винтерскейл, наконец, не замечает вас. Он вскидывает руку и тянется к вам... Тянется... {/n}

languages.text: {n}As soon as the priest's voice stops, your entire body arches with a crack as if electrocuted. You are standing on the tips of your toes, staring at a crimson sky at dusk that has turned into an ocean of spilt blood. Its still surface is broken by a hand with fingers covered in rings, and Calligos Winterscale emerges from the depths — only to take a single breath and disappear once more into the blood. It happens again, and again, and again... until he finally notices you. He throws out his hand and reaches for you... He reaches out... {/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Как только голос жреца затихает, ваше тело с хрустом изгибается, как от удара током. Вы стоите на цыпочках и широко раскрытыми глазами глядите на алое закатное небо, ставшее океаном из пролитой крови. Тихую гладь разрывает покрытая перстнями рука, и Каллигос Винтерскейл выныривает из глубин — но лишь для того, чтобы сделать очередной вдох и вновь погрузиться на дно. Это происходит снова, и снова, и снова... Пока Винтерскейл, наконец, не замечает вас. Он вскидывает руку и тянется к вам... Тянется... {/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As soon as the priest's voice dies down, your entire body arches with a crack, as if electrocuted. You stand atiptoe and look at the crimson dusk sky, turned a bloody ocean, with your eyes wide open. The quiet surface is torn by a hand with fingers covered in signet-rings, and Calligos Winterscale comes up from the depths — but only to take another breath and dive down once again. It happens again, and again, and again... Until Winterscale finally notices you, He throws his hand up and reaches out for you... Reaches out... {/n}

{n}As soon as the priest's voice dies down, your entire body arches with a crack, as if electrocuted. You stand atiptoe and look at the crimson dusk sky, turned a bloody ocean, with your eyes wide open. The quiet surface is torn by a hand with fingers covered in signet-rings, and Calligos Winterscale comes up from the depths — but only to take another breath and dive down once again. It happens again, and again, and again... Until Winterscale finally notices you, He throws his hand up and reaches out for you... Reaches out... {/n}

languages.text: {n}En cuanto deja de oírse la voz del sacerdote, todo tu cuerpo se dobla con un chasquido, como sacudido por una descarga eléctrica. Te pones de puntillas y miras con los ojos abiertos como platos al cielo carmesí del ocaso, convertido ahora en un océano sanguinolento. Una mano con anillos en los dedos atraviesa su serena superficie, y Calligos Winterscale emerge de las profundidades, pero solo para tomar aliento y volver a sumergirse. Ocurre una y otra vez, y otra, y otra... hasta que por fin Winterscale se fija en ti, levanta la mano y la extiende hacia ti intentando agarrarte... Te tiende la mano...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as the priest's voice stops, your entire body arches with a crack as if electrocuted. You are standing on the tips of your toes, staring at a crimson sky at dusk that has turned into an ocean of spilt blood. Its still surface is broken by a hand with fingers covered in rings, and Calligos Winterscale emerges from the depths — only to take a single breath and disappear once more into the blood. It happens again, and again, and again... until he finally notices you. He throws out his hand and reaches for you... He reaches out... {/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En cuanto deja de oírse la voz del sacerdote, todo tu cuerpo se dobla con un chasquido, como sacudido por una descarga eléctrica. Te pones de puntillas y miras con los ojos abiertos como platos al cielo carmesí del ocaso, convertido ahora en un océano sanguinolento. Una mano con anillos en los dedos atraviesa su serena superficie, y Calligos Winterscale emerge de las profundidades, pero solo para tomar aliento y volver a sumergirse. Ocurre una y otra vez, y otra, y otra... hasta que por fin Winterscale se fija en ti, levanta la mano y la extiende hacia ti intentando agarrarte... cada vez más cerca... {/n}

languages.text: {n}祭司的声音刚一消失，你的整个身体就像是遭到电击一样，弓了起来。你踮起脚尖，瞪大眼睛，黄昏时分的深红色天空逐渐化作一片血海。一只戴着许多戒指的手打破了平静的水面，卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔从血海深处浮现，但仅仅吸了一口气，便再次潜入了血海之中。一次又一次，一次又一次……直到温特斯凯尔终于注意到你，他甩着胳膊，向你伸出了手……伸出手来……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as the priest's voice stops, your entire body arches with a crack as if electrocuted. You are standing on the tips of your toes, staring at a crimson sky at dusk that has turned into an ocean of spilt blood. Its still surface is broken by a hand with fingers covered in rings, and Calligos Winterscale emerges from the depths — only to take a single breath and disappear once more into the blood. It happens again, and again, and again... until he finally notices you. He throws out his hand and reaches for you... He reaches out... {/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}祭司的声音刚一消失，你的整个身体就像是遭到电击一样，弓了起来。你踮起脚尖，瞪大眼睛。在你眼前，黄昏时分的深红色天空逐渐化作一片血海。一只戴着图章戒指的手打破了平静的水面，卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔从血海深处浮出，但只是吸了一口气，又潜入水下。一次又一次，一次又一次……直到温特斯凯尔终于注意到你，他甩着胳膊，向你伸出了手……伸出了手……{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dès que la voix du prêtre se tait, tout votre corps se cambre dans un bruit déchirant, comme si vous veniez d'être {mf|électrocuté|électrocutée}. Vous vous tenez sur la pointe des pieds et contemplez le ciel rougeâtre du crépuscule qui semble être devenu une mer de sang. Une main aux doigts couverts de chevalières crève sa surface paisible, puis vous voyez Calligos Winterscale surgir des profondeurs et prendre une bouffée d'air avant de replonger. La scène se répète encore et encore, jusqu'à ce que Winterscale vous remarque enfin. Vous le voyez tendre la main vers vous... Elle se rapproche... {/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as the priest's voice stops, your entire body arches with a crack as if electrocuted. You are standing on the tips of your toes, staring at a crimson sky at dusk that has turned into an ocean of spilt blood. Its still surface is broken by a hand with fingers covered in rings, and Calligos Winterscale emerges from the depths — only to take a single breath and disappear once more into the blood. It happens again, and again, and again... until he finally notices you. He throws out his hand and reaches for you... He reaches out... {/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dès que la voix du prêtre se tait, tout votre corps se cambre dans un bruit déchirant, comme si vous veniez d'être {mf|électrocuté|électrocutée}. Vous vous tenez sur la pointe des pieds et contemplez le ciel rougeâtre du crépuscule qui semble être devenu une mer de sang. Une main aux doigts couverts de chevalières crève sa surface paisible, puis vous voyez Calligos Winterscale surgir des profondeurs et prendre une bouffée d'air avant de replonger. La scène se répète encore et encore, jusqu'à ce que Winterscale vous remarque enfin. Vous le voyez tendre la main vers vous... Elle se rapproche... {/n}

languages.text: {n}司祭の声がやむと同時に、感電したようにあなたの全身が弓なりになる。あなたはつま先立ちになり、血の海と化した真紅の夕暮れの空を目を見開いて眺める。静かな海面がリングで覆われた指を持つ手によって引き裂かれ、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールが深みより上がってくる。だが、それはまた息を吸って潜るだけだ。それが何度も何度も、何度も繰り返される…ウィンタースケールがついにあなたに気づくまで。そして彼は手を上げ、あなたに手を伸ばす…手を伸ばし…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as the priest's voice stops, your entire body arches with a crack as if electrocuted. You are standing on the tips of your toes, staring at a crimson sky at dusk that has turned into an ocean of spilt blood. Its still surface is broken by a hand with fingers covered in rings, and Calligos Winterscale emerges from the depths — only to take a single breath and disappear once more into the blood. It happens again, and again, and again... until he finally notices you. He throws out his hand and reaches for you... He reaches out... {/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}司祭の声がやむと同時に、感電したようにあなたの全身が弓なりになる。あなたはつま先立ちになり、血の海と化した真紅の夕暮れの空を目を見開いて眺める。静かな海面がシグネットリングで覆われた指を持つ手によって引き裂かれ、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールが深みより上がってくる―だが、それはまた息を吸って潜るだけだ。それが何度も何度も…何度も繰り返される…ウィンタースケールがついにあなたに気づくまで。そして彼は手を上げ、あなたに手を伸ばす…手を伸ばし…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sobald die Stimme des Priesters verstummt, zuckt dein gesamter Körper, als hättest du einen Stromschlag erhalten. Du stehst auf deinen Zehenspitzen und starrst auf einen blutroten abendlichen Himmel, der sich in einen Ozean aus vergossenem Blut verwandelt hat. Eine beringte Hand stößt durch die Oberfläche, als sich aus den Tiefen Calligos Winterzunder erhebt ... und einen einzigen Atemzug macht, ehe er aufs Neue im Blut versinkt. Der Vorgang wiederholt sich immer und immer wieder ... bis er dich schließlich bemerkt. Er streckt seine Hand nach dir aus ... Er greift nach dir ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as the priest's voice stops, your entire body arches with a crack as if electrocuted. You are standing on the tips of your toes, staring at a crimson sky at dusk that has turned into an ocean of spilt blood. Its still surface is broken by a hand with fingers covered in rings, and Calligos Winterscale emerges from the depths — only to take a single breath and disappear once more into the blood. It happens again, and again, and again... until he finally notices you. He throws out his hand and reaches for you... He reaches out... {/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sobald die Stimme des Priesters verstummt, biegt sich dein gesamter Körper mit einem lauten Knall, als hättest du einen Stromschlag bekommen. Du stehst auf Zehenspitzen und blickst mit weit aufgerissenen Augen in den roten Dämmerungshimmel, in einen blutigen Ozean verwandelt. Die ruhige Oberfläche wird durch deine Hand mit Fingern voller Siegelringe durchstoßen, und Calligos Winterzunder taucht aus den Tiefen auf — jedoch nur, um einen weiteren Atemzug zu holen und wieder abzutauchen. Es geschieht wieder und wieder und wieder ... Bis Winterzunder dich schließlich bemerkt, seine Hand hinaufwirft und nach dir greift ... Greift ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Rahibin sesi kesildiği gibi tüm bedenin, âdeta elektriğe tutulmuşçasına çatırdayarak bükülüyor. Ayak parmaklarının ucunda duruyorsun. Gözlerini gün batımında dökülen kanlardan bir okyanusa dönüşen kızıl göğe dikiyorsun. Okyanusun durgun yüzeyi, parmakları yüzüklerle kaplı bir elle bozuluyor ve derinlerinden Calligos Winterscale çıkageliyor, ta ki tek bir nefes alıp bir kez daha dökülen kanın içinde kaybolana dek... Aynı şeyi tekrar yaşıyorsun, sonra tekrar ve tekrar... En nihayetinde seni fark edene dek... Elini uzatıp sana ulaşmaya çalışıyor... Uzanıyor...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as the priest's voice stops, your entire body arches with a crack as if electrocuted. You are standing on the tips of your toes, staring at a crimson sky at dusk that has turned into an ocean of spilt blood. Its still surface is broken by a hand with fingers covered in rings, and Calligos Winterscale emerges from the depths — only to take a single breath and disappear once more into the blood. It happens again, and again, and again... until he finally notices you. He throws out his hand and reaches for you... He reaches out... {/n}
